name: Devillish Delights
description:
You're a demon that has to fulfill as many food orders as you can in three minutes in Hell's kitchen.

Cook delicious cuisines such as;

  • The Finger Dog
  • Eyeball Stew
  • Devilled Eggs

Made as part of a 3 day game jam.

Team:

  • Programmers: Josh Moten, Max Atkinson
  • Designers: Merve Soylu, Marcus Steele, Rhiannon Forster
  • Artists: Erin Jones, Rebekah Ure, Massimo Gamboni ,Tenzin Rongtsang, Angus Sutherland
